data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Yasothon, Thailand that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yasothon, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Yasothon to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, sanctify the 3,516 believers in Yasothon and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Yasothon, Thailand know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Hindi people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Hindi people.
Spirit, encourage the church in Yasothon, Thailand to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Yasothon, Thailand.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Yasothon, Thailand.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
